alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 9:52PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Benton and east central Yakima Counties through 1015 PM PDT... At 952 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grandview, or near Sunnyside, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside, Grandview, Toppenish, Granger and Mabton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Yakima Valley
